name: Little Garden
description:
Expanding your island make it possible for more plant growth. throug you can cook a lot more meal with these plants and improve you income. All thes things are can be costly. Be careful! As the island grows, so does the rent it pays. If you couldn't pay the rent. You get kicked out of the island


Growing plants gives you experience points. You can unlock new cards with these points. Each unlocked card will be more expensive and valuable!




Every day orders come to you by hungry people. If you can complete these orders, you can earn experiance point and gold. If you want to cook different meals, you should unlock all cards. Difficult meals more valuable! These orders will be significant for expand island and unlock new cards. You can unlock new cards to find new recipes. Also you can get some randomly.




When island expand, things can get tough. You couldn't to water and havest all plants! For these issues you should use important tools.
